results.name: wordpress-mysql/wordpress-5445bc4985-dnbrv

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: wordpress-mysql/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-5445bc4985-dnbrv], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service doesn't have any ready endpoints because the specified pod is not ready.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect pod details using `kubectl describe pod wordpress-5445bc4985-dnbrv`.
3. Look for readiness probe issues or errors.
4. Fix any issues found and redeploy if necessary.
